title: 06/29/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/29/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss the fall out from yesterday's interview with Scottie Pippen. Marc Silverman, host of "Silvy and Waddle" in Chicago joined us to share the local reaction to Scottie's comments. Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix calls in to discuss whether the media has been too hard on Paul George. And The US Open Champion Jon Rahm explains what he was feeling as he was being pulled off the 18th green at the Memorial Tournament.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss the fall out from yesterday's interview with Scottie Pippen. Marc Silverman, host of "Silvy and Waddle" in Chicago joined us to share the local reaction to Scottie's comments. Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix calls in to discuss whether the media has been too hard on Paul George. And The US Open Champion Jon Rahm explains what he was feeling as he was being pulled off the 18th green at the Memorial Tournament.
